text: To aey paigambar! Kahin aisa na ho ke tum un cheezon mein se kisi cheez ko (bayan karne se) chodh do jo tumhari taraf wahee ki jaa rahi hai. Aur is baat par dil tangg ho ke woh kahenge “is shaks par koi khazana kyun na utara gaya” ya yeh ke “iske saath koi farishta kyun na aaya”. Tum to mehaz khabardaar karne waley ho, aagey har cheez ka hawaladaar Allah hai
